labels.value: Organizations/bodies/agencies providing information for the compilation of the report
Please provide information on the preparation of this report, including, where appropriate, stakeholders involved and material used, by completing the following Table.

article_titles.article_title: Article 4.1 Article 3.1(a) (b) Wastes Controlled for the Purpose of Transboundary Movement

Article 5.4 Restrictions/prohibitions on the import and transit of hazardous wastes

Article 5.1 Restrictions on the export/import/transit/ of hazardous wastes
Article 12 Information to and Participation to the Public
